spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but the deck/balcony structure along the top edge is fused with the interior, losing the recessed character of the 2d plan. Window voids are poorly defined.

structural_fidelity.notes: Bathroom/Toilet partitions are simplified. The utility area door and internal partitions between the kitchen and main hall have misaligned thicknesses.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is high fidelity. The dining table, sofas, and bed orientations match the floor plan accurately with appropriate scaling.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric camera angle and soft lighting. Geometry is clean, though some wall-to-floor junctions exhibit slight light leaks.

detected_errors.description: Outer deck/balcony boundaries are misplaced or merged into the primary structural walls.
Door swing indications are missing in the 3D render, replaced by simple wall breaks.
The 'Lobby' entrance width appears slightly narrower than the 4'11" dimensioned in the plan.
Rendering artifact observed at the bottom-left corner near the Home Office where walls do not meet the floor perfectly.
